lore.unifiedstorage.storage_interface: §7"This item allows you to extract or insert items from/to §7a §eStorage Network§7."
lore.unifiedstorage.cloning_network_card: §7"This item allows you to clone current the viewing data of a §eStorage Controller §7to use it in another controller."
lore.unifiedstorage.wireless_storage: §7"This item allows you to access your §eStorage Controller §7anywhere."
lore.unifiedstorage.network_card:
§7"This item links storages and or terminal blocks together"

§4*Don't link a double chest twice!
lore.unifiedstorage.storage_wings:
§7"This item allows you to fly
§7based on how many items you
§7have in your Storage Controller."
lore.unifiedstorage.crafting_upgrade: §7"This upgrade allows you to unlock the crafting grid"
lore.unifiedstorage.speed_upgrade:
§7"This upgrade allows you to speed up machines"

§eCan stack up to 64
lore.unifiedstorage.wireless_upgrade: §7"This upgrade allows you to use the §eStorage Controller §7wirelessly"
lore.unifiedstorage.dimensional_upgrade: §7"This upgrade allows the §eStorage Controller to view storages from other dimensions"
lore.unifiedstorage.storage_controller: §7"Use a network card to link various storages together to see it as one unified storage"
language.unifiedstorage.no_wireless_upgr: Storage Controller has no §aWireless Upgrade Card§r.
language.unifiedstorage.clone_not_succes: §cCannot clone data - no network card found.
container.unifiedstorage.interface_netwo:
Insert Storage Controller Network Card
§7The first linked §eStorage Controller
§7on the §eNetwork Card§7 will be linked 
§7with this interface block.
container.unifiedstorage.networkSlotDesc:
Insert Network Card
§7Network card links different
§7storage blocks together.
container.unifiedstorage.searchLore:
Search by Name & Lore
§7Use @ to search by mod (@storage)
§7Use # to search by tag (#planks)

§eYou can combine prefixes (@mod (#)item)
lore.unifiedstorage.disabled_crafting:
§fCrafting Disabled
§7Insert a §eCrafting Upgrade Card
§7to unlock this slot.
lore.unifiedstorage.filter_empty:
§fExtract/Insert Items
§7Insert an item to §eextract §7from network.
§7Leave empty to §einsert §7into network.
container.unifiedstorage.upgradeSlotDesc:
Insert Upgrade Card
§7Upgrading provides a way to 
§7enhance the controller's capabilities.
container.unifiedstorage.interface_upgra:
Insert Speed Upgrade Card
§7Upgrading makes extracting/inserting 
§7faster.

§eYou can insert up to 64 cards.
container.unifiedstorage.crafting_clear_:
§fClear Crafting Grid
§7Returns the items to your storage.
container.unifiedstorage.interface_infor:
§nInformation

§fEmpty Hand:
§7Removes item from filter

§fItem in Hand:
§7Left Click - Put all item in filter
§7Right Click - Add one item to filter

§cExtractions & Insertions will only work on storages that are chunk loaded.
container.unifiedstorage.visualItemSlotD:
Insert an Item
§7Providing an item gives a visual for
§7this controller block like an item frame.

§7§o* Putting more of the same
§7§o  items changes the visual.
§7§o  (Only for Blocks)

Controller with a dye
